verses.verse: וַֽיִּקְרְב֞וּ <S%H7126><s%> vai-yik-re-Vu came near רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei And the chief הָֽאָב֗וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot, fathers לְמִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-Pa-chat of the families בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children גִלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מָכִ֣יר <S%H4353><s%> ma-Chir of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> mi-mish-pe-Chot of the families בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; of Joseph וַֽיְדַבְּר֞וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru and spake לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei and before הַנְּשִׂאִ֔ים <S%H5387><s%> han-ne-si-'Im, the princes רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the chief אָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot fathers לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru, And they said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni my lord צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, The LORD לָתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land בְּנַחֲלָ֛ה <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-Lah for an inheritance בְּגוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> be-go-Ral by lot לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽאדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> va-do-Ni and my lord צֻוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tzuv-Vah was commanded בַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, by the LORD לָתֵ֗ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet, to give אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat the inheritance צְלָפְחָ֥ד <S%H6765><s%> tze-la-fe-Chad of Zelophehad אָחִ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-nu our brother לִבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1323><s%> liv-no-Tav. unto his daughters

וְ֠הָיוּ <S%H1961><s%> Ve-ha-yu belong לְאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> le-'e-Chad to any מִבְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei of the sons שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei of the [other] tribes בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְנָשִׁים֒ <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim And if they be married וְנִגְרְעָ֤ה <S%H1639><s%> ve-nig-re-'Ah be taken נַחֲלָתָן֙ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tan then shall their inheritance מִנַּחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> min-na-cha-Lat from the inheritance אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-nu, of our fathers וְנוֹסַ֕ף <S%H3254><s%> ve-no-Saf and shall be put עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al unto נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat to the inheritance הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh, of the tribe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to which תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah belong לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וּמִגֹּרַ֥ל <S%H1486><s%> u-mig-go-Ral from the lot נַחֲלָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Te-nu of our inheritance יִגָּרֵֽעַ׃ <S%H1639><s%> yig-ga-Re-a'. whereunto they are received so shall it be taken

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- When יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh comes הַיֹּבֵל֮ <S%H3104><s%> hai-yo-Vel And when the jubile לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְנֽוֹסְפָה֙ <S%H3254><s%> ve-nos-Fah be put נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tan, shall be then shall their inheritance עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al unto נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat unto the inheritance הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> ham-mat-Teh, of the tribe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher to which תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah belong לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וּמִֽנַּחֲלַת֙ <S%H5159><s%> u-min-na-cha-Lat whereunto they are received so shall their inheritance מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-nu, of our fathers יִגָּרַ֖ע <S%H1639><s%> yig-ga-Ra' be taken away נַחֲלָתָֽן׃ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tan. from the inheritance

וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh The tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph דֹּבְרִֽים׃ <S%H1696><s%> doe-Rim. hath said

זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This הַדָּבָ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah doth command יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לִבְנ֤וֹת <S%H1323><s%> liv-Not concerning the daughters צְלָפְחָד֙ <S%H6765><s%> tze-la-fe-Chad of Zelophehad לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> lat-Tov best בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-nei-Hem to whom they think תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah become לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim; Let them marry אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'Ach, only לְמִשְׁפַּ֛חַת <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-Pa-chat only to the family מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hem of their father תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah shall they לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim. shall they marry

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no תִסֹּ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> tis-So remove נַחֲלָה֙ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah So shall not the inheritance לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-Teh from tribe אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מַטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh; to tribe כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, for every one בְּנַחֲלַת֙ <S%H5159><s%> be-na-cha-Lat himself to the inheritance מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav, of his fathers יִדְבְּק֖וּ <S%H1692><s%> yid-be-Ku shall keep בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol Every בַּ֞ת <S%H1323><s%> bat And every daughter יֹרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> yo-Re-shet that possesseth נַחֲלָ֗ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah, an inheritance מִמַּטּוֹת֮ <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-tOt in any tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְאֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> le-'e-Chad, unto one מִמִּשְׁפַּ֛חַת <S%H4940><s%> mi-mish-Pa-chat of the family מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha of her father תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah; shall be wife לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an, so יִֽירְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> yi-re-Shu may enjoy בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat the inheritance אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav. of his fathers

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no תִסֹּ֧ב <S%H5437><s%> tis-So remove נַחֲלָ֛ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah Neither shall the inheritance מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mi-mat-Teh from [one] tribe לְמַטֶּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh tribe אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher; to another כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish but every one בְּנַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> be-Na-cha-la-To, himself to his own inheritance יִדְבְּק֕וּ <S%H1692><s%> yid-be-Ku shall keep מַטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> mat-Tot of the tribes בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su so did בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not the daughters צְלָפְחָֽד׃ <S%H6765><s%> tze-la-fe-Chad. of Zelophehad

וַתִּהְיֶ֜ינָה <S%H1961><s%> vat-tih-Yei-nah become מַחְלָ֣ה <S%H4244><s%> mach-Lah For Mahlah תִרְצָ֗ה <S%H8656><s%> tir-Tzah, Tirzah וְחָגְלָ֧ה <S%H2295><s%> ve-cha-ge-Lah and Hoglah וּמִלְכָּ֛ה <S%H4435><s%> u-mil-Kah and Milcah וְנֹעָ֖ה <S%H5270><s%> ve-no-'Ah and Noah בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> be-Not the daughters צְלָפְחָ֑ד <S%H6765><s%> tze-la-fe-Chad; of Zelophehad לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei brothers' sons דֹדֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H1730><s%> do-dei-Hen unto their father's לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim. were married

מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֛ת <S%H4940><s%> mi-mish-pe-Chot into the families בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the sons מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu remained לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> le-na-Shim; [And] they were married וַתְּהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi remained נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tan, and their inheritance עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- with מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh remained in the tribe מִשְׁפַּ֥חַת <S%H4940><s%> mish-Pa-chat of the family אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hen. of their father

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These הַמִּצְוֹ֞ת <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vot These [are] the commandments וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <S%H4941><s%> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim, and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh of Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> be-'ar-Vot in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> yar-Den by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> ye-re-Cho. [near] Jericho
